name: Island Delight Beef Pattie 140G
description: Tender minced beef simmered with nine herbs & spices and baked in a light golden flaky pastry crust for the authentic taste of Jamaica's famous street food.
usage: <Cooking_Instructions><Cooking_Guidelines>Cooking Instructions (General): Remove all packaging.Caution: fillings may be very hot.Oven cook (From Chilled): Highly recommended for perfect pastry:Pre-heat oven to 200째C / 400째F / Gas Mark 6.Cook for 10-15 minutes.Oven cook (From Frozen): Highly recommended for perfect pastry:Pre-heat oven to 200째C / 400째F / Gas Mark 6.Cook for 15-20 minutes.Microwave (From Chilled): This may impair the quality of the pastry.Based on an 800w microwave, cook on full power for 1 minute 30 seconds.Allow to stand for 1 minute before eating.</Cooking_Guidelines></Cooking_Instructions>
ingredients: Spices (Chilli, Pepper, Pimento, Fenugreek, Coriander, Mustard, Turmeric, Caraway, Cumin, Celery, Paprika, Poppy and Fennel)
PromotionDescription: 50 extra points on any sandwich filler or pate
